lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you talked to yours since you were a kid, too?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As a kid, you know, we didn't really have anything like that in my tribe other than the matriarch of our tribe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was there a particular reason y'all started communicating?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I guess I found him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were you lost? Were you wandering?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, I was lost, I was lost.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were with people first, then you weren't?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did you leave?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I left my tribe because...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it's a sore subject, we do not have to push it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, it's-- Some of them know and we've discussed, but I was-- I was married at one point, and in our tribe, we are chosen a mate by the Sky Spear and I married.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sky Spear?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I ran away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's when your god, the Stormlord, found you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, there's some time that I'm missing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You left your wife?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They had captured her, and I-- -I ran away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're missing time, though, you said? A gap in your memory?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am missing a gap in my memory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't exactly know, but weeks, months?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a gap in your memory, don't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Molly had one, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't you, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I remember everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you ever think, Yasha, about going back and seeing what Zuala's doing? If she's okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: they were executing her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see her die?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just ran because I was scared and I am a coward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you're a survivor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's one way to put it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am sorry for your loss.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's terrible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes I think about going back and turning myself in, I guess, but I guess there's also a part of me that is upset that I wasn't able to be with the person that I wanted to be with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about revenge?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think about that every day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could go with you. We could kill them all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But that's not--I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was that? What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know, I think-- I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think your murderous revenge could wait 13 days?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because maybe we could follow this clue, and find out where the Overcrow is, and meet up and rendezvous with this person in blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And figure out what the fuck is going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have to figure out where the Overcrow is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, can't be too many Overcrows, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we will start by going back to collect on our bounty and ask around the city and hopefully we will have curried favor after this somewhat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you have a Yellow Parchments or something that we can just sort of flip through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yellow Parchments?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think only the bigger cities have those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you're right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're starting to expand into rural areas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even really understand the value of the work that goes into them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if I could scry on that place or something and figure out where it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so cool that you can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I want to do it all the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty rad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You zoom in and you see the person where they are and what they're doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need a thing? You need an item?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or apparently if I know the person or if I know a lot of details, I don't necessarily need something of theirs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can just creepily watch them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could watch any of you any time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) You could be watching Caleb at night?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The more you know about a person, the easier it is. I have tried to study this, but I have not yet cracked it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know a lot about you, Caleb, so I could scry on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He kind of had a Zemnian accent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least I think he did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know any--what did he look like? Blond, you said? Do you know any blonds?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was human and he had really beautiful blond hair that came to about his shoulders and then it had a little bit of a curl to it, and it was like combed back, like he obviously cared about the way he looked. He was very clean shaven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only thing that I could think that would be would be one of the paintings at the Academy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe, but even--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! You know what I'm going to do? I'm going to Disguise Self and I'm going to make myself look like the guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But do what he's doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit and I'm going to start writing, and I'm picking at my ear, and picking my nose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do his robes look familiar to any of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check, Caleb and Beauregard, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going with that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand up and start dancing like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You doing a dance as this guy? Was he dancing in your memory?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I'm going to make him dance around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, neither of you are able to pick out the individual. You don't think you've crossed paths with them or there aren't any discerning elements. They're youngish, meaning for somebody to be wearings such fine clothing in the way that you were describing and the den that they were in, they probably look like late 20s or so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all know what they look like now, so if we run into this person we'll immediately know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was speaking into a swirly, glass bowl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was about that big around, smooth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look like this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks similar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that one? Did we find that one? Did we always have that? Did we find that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's his transmuter stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got this in Zadash. No, it's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Talk into it. Say something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got this in Zadash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know where its buddy is, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's for communicating with one other person and whoever has it and I've just been carrying it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You haven't talked into it yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, because we did not know who was on the other end.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (exclamation)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything that was like--the zip code was on the-- anything Zadash-y?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the room look anything like the Lavish Chateau or anything? Was it that nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it looked like it was well--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was it called?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pillow Top?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Pillow Top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh the Pillow Trove, you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did look like a nice den, with fine furniture more than your standard, you know--merchant or noble level, at least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't look a like a room he was renting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed to be well-lived in? It resembled to be an abode, as opposed to a stay at an inn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's go embarrass this fucker and go collect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not going to talk into the stone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This belonged to that merchant, and we fucked his life, don't you remember? There was the judge and the wealthy merchant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lord Suutan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and we burned both their--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we took his stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Took the stone. But if we fucked his life up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, remember you almost died in that rug! That was so sad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think, perhaps, this isn't the place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we didn't start the fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it always burning?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Since the world's been turning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get out. Get out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Landspeaker stands up and says, "You ready to go?" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In terms of--if this is the person planting stones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn myself back into me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Empire has not looked good in a long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a lot of hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a lot of very blonde hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we leave, I just give Yasha a hug on the way out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give her some pats on the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (patting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First, we're going to the fort, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, to drop off the giant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drop off the giant, make sure everybody clears out nice and orderly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, you had taken the moorbounders...?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did. We took them as far as we could go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yarnball! Yarnball!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jannik!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (blows raspberry)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jannik!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try to give a really loud battle whistle? To see if they come?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Performance check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: --attack your ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between you whistling very loudly, you calling for your moorbounder--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whistles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were pack hunting and, as they come up and emerge, you can see chunks of stringy spider flesh in their jaws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Yarnball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all come bounding up and leap, and skid to halt, stumbling, knocking Jester off onto the muddy floor and begins licking your face, these long streaks of spider blood left on the side of your cheek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Careful, you're going to have the runs for days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snorting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Halt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (scratching)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growling diminishes)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yarnball, speak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (retches) (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your companions are lucky to have you, "for most are lost in our crazy world of dreams "without someone to wake them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good luck out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope you find your interests," and she stands up, grabs the staff.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: (speaks gibberish)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what they're trying to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She laughs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (imitates Giant)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (corrects his Giant pronunciation)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (attempts to imitate Matt)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until, eventually, the mine and steelworks are yours, open and empty. You've done it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's steal everything and run!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We get to keep the whole mine?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well now, no. We're going to be giving it back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We live here now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's ours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I call this room!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there piles of armor on the ground now? Is that just--they just sort of--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's scrap. It's scrap that was tied together to form a makeshift scale mail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to do a thing with me really quickly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make it look like there was a tussle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my axe and hit a couple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you hitting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The armor.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Banging them up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Leaving a couple burn marks around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Making the fight look a little bigger than it was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we break some windows and doors and things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I run over and break a window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester just runs and fucking destroys two windows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I let her, I guess, get it out of her system.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole place is just in complete disarray from the fight that took place originally when they arrived, so you have indeed added to the chaos.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we just head back and tell them how easy it was at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, where are they all hiding out, all the human people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back that ways a spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The makeshift tent city on the outside of the Vermaloc.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone want to take that locket and do anything with it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do a dramatic reading of his letter?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe- do you have any magic that could make it--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could Disguise Self as the girl in the locket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could turn myself as Bodo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This feels complicated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I make myself look like the girl and you make yourself look like Bodo?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we like just (grunts)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, just yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you Thaumaturgy my voice so it's super loud?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think I can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's that dollar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, do it again! You almost just touched it again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good, we're good. We're good here, everything's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your arm's on fire right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can't do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, do you do Disguise Self? I've forgotten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, I think he's a better body type to be Bodo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thaumaturgy can affect your own voice not somebody else's.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I can't do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You make yourself look like Bodo, I'll be the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys can simulate making out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just in front of everyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just simulation, just going to act out to go with our story.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Junior high school theater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Beau's going to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like an interpretive letter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll act out the letter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I don't know if I understand, but I guess I'll just follow your lead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Follow her lead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can make everyone look like anything you want, so if you want to have multiple people as part of your production.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah let's make half of us look like the girl and half look like him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, that seems like taking it to a real--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! And the we could just do a dance and have an orgy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like we don't quite need that much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If there are more players in the story, as you read, maybe you can decide and bamf one of us into one of the new characters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, what we don't need to talk about this. We should just do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha, can I get up on your shoulders so we have a bit of a stage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have the letter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great, guys. All right, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's take it back to the tits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, are you all just yourselves right now?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approaches. "Right, do you need the foreman?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very much so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. How did it go?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Problem is solved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Giants are kaput.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really not that big of a deal, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I certainly hope you aren't pulling my leg."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We actually took a nice long nap afterwards, maybe even found some stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we go to search around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nevertheless let's go ahead and get everyone back to work!" and he shouts out, "Everyone!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everyone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone starts gathering up and hearing this,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gather round we have an announcement to make.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, it seems--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It seems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It seems--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (in the same way) It seems.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Caduceus and Yasha and Jester look like the woman in the locket, and Nott and Caleb and Fjord suddenly look like Bodo of different sizes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please grab your stuff--what are you laughing at?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It appears removing problems is a reoccurring theme from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around. "(sputters)"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is this?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, what happened? It looks like he's seen--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I pick up Beau and I put her on--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say a ghost, but I'm not sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It appears--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's trying to hide you, the three of you, but there's too many of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The poet, the bodo-et of the poet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We shall be reenacting such poem for you all. I hope you enjoy this wonderful performance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We give you the Bodo Players!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everybody, everybody. (claps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, "(whimpers)"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just let it happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will give you gold to stop this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (clears throat) My dearest Lorna.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me. And her and her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Night after night, as I lay underneath the stars in this encampment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He crumples to his knees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the soft supple bosom that you have invited me into.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab Nott's little Bodo and push it against my bosom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (motorboating)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please. Please stop."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the nervousness that you alight in the depth of my bowels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Thaumaturgy fart noises. I Thaumaturgy fart noises!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(whimpers)"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you held my face and told me, I love every scent that comes from you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab Fjord's face and I say, "I love every scent that comes from you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kiss him. Kiss him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (kiss noises) And I don't kiss him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just (boof) into the mud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But, yeah, that's the story of Lorna.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We bow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beau-regardless.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Beau-regardless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a lot of the folks seem to be particularly enjoying this entire display.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was good. I think we succeeded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, a stunning career.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're having this discussion all in disguise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the second in command goes, "Right, so anyway, gather your things. Back to work." And they all start gathering their supplies and they start taking down the tents and it seems the encampment is starting to make its way back towards where it originally belonged.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's pretty sufficient.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That works, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys got it from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards have lifted him up and he's just like groggy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may have been the meanest thing I've done to someone I'm not related to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was pretty mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They drag him off into the tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, back to town?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Moorbounders!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (snaps) I make myself look like me again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cat yowling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Begin heading southward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just as embarrassing for us as for him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no shame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to camp for the evening on the outskirts, or do you continue and press on through the night?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We press on into the night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much longer of a ride is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking at another six hours or so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine, that's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is late, but do you require "your animals taken care of?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, please, the usual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Could you help with that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him nervous and uncomfortable around the moorbounders. The moorbounders, sensing that nervous energy taking an immediate interest in him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yarnball, don't eat him. No, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't have a place to put these creatures, but has found a makeshift space for them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While they're doing that, I'm going to run upstairs and see if Yeza's home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you just throw it open?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (scared, surprised shouting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your wife. Who's a goblin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. I was wondering "when you guys were going to come back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry it took so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it's okay. You okay?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay? Did anything happen? Did you have to kill anyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did anyone visit? Did anyone knock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, they pretty much--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they bring you food? We arranged for them to bring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just trying to keep a low profile, like you said."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it fun a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was for the first day or two."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll take that (laughs). Hi," and he gets out of the bed and comes over and gives you a hug and pulls away. "Are we staying here much longer?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They'll be up here any second now and we need to get you to a safer place and we need to find Luc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, welcome back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's good to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you going to come to sleep?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whenever you're ready."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to go back to sleep."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll be in in a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, the rest of you return back up to the secondary floor of the Dim's Inn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to go to sleep quite yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries. Well, you guys are gathered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The best reunion ever?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good, that's progress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, we have to do something-- we have to do something as a group, but then also, I have to figure out what I'm doing.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, he can't stay here forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to stay here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Are we going to stay here? Are you going to stay here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going with him or are you going to hang out with us some more?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have only been here for a few days and we haven't even been here for those days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to go check in with Waccoh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not going to stay here forever, but we have a purpose here, don't we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least for two weeks until we figure out what the deal is with the Overcrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's too dangerous. We can't keep him locked in a room. Are you thinking of sending him to be with your son?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't send him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if Caleb keeps doing some research then, yeah, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't we have a way of possibly moving people to that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need about a day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure he can wait a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, the Bright Queen has a teleportation thingy. Maybe if she likes us enough then she can use it and you can send him with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm. That would be good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I'm curious: do you wish to, at some point, get into contact with your higher up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could do something together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The lot of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, but tonight we sleep, I suppose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we have to think granule, bit by bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Granul-arly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gradularly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's not right either, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should all go to bed probably and go collect and then we pick which of the things on our to-do list is next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can borrow Ms. Beau for a moment outside, just for me to finish up a quick thing, if that'd be all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, whatever you need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect. I'm going to hand you a shovel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go out back and set up the little goblin body on the back wall in the rain, while you dig a little hole for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is this the burnt crispy one? You dragged a burnt crispy goblin body eight hours across?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goblin body for eight hours across.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm surprised it still has all of its limbs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was very gentle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was wondering where that smell was-- anyway, let's do this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While she digs, I'm going to set up everything I need and I'm going to cast Speak with Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The incense you have to cover with your hand a bit because of the nature of the rain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got the cloak up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're digging, you're just soaking in the rain. You look over and you can see the glow of the embers of the incense lighting up the bottom of Clay's face, and for as sweet as a man as he is, it looks almost ominous in this one visual representation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not really something we're supposed to do very often.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bones clack a bit, one of the hands reaches up towards its throat and you see the chest move as if it inhales.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take the spade and I hold it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clacking) It just holds the breath in the chest and looks towards you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you mind telling us what were you doing in that cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No predators."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you see who put it there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tried to chew it, but broke teeth, "so left it no bother."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Human. You sure--could you describe the human or anything you noticed about the human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did not want to be found, humans make goblins dead."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did the human seem to move magically fast, faster than a normal creature would?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did not see, too scared."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe ask how long ago it was?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did it fall in love before it died?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None of you get to, only you because you're the only one there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe ask him how long he was there, if he started dealing with the invasion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long ago did that happen, would you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "17 days, maybe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (exhale) The head cracks down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now we know it works quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wasn't in there, that was just-- It's just flesh, not a soul, not anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kid slayer, NPC slayer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just making me talk, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you guys make your way back up into the inn to your rooms to dry off a bit and shake off the weather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we're walking back up: Hey, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you know if you're special?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't understand the question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you all have gods who have taken an interest in you or some weird phenomenon that's happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A small square of land. Everything's interesting at this point. I don't really understand what you mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well,

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The things you can do, that's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plenty of people in my family can do things like this or do this, have done this. I'm pretty typical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you follow a god if someone else tells you to? Or they say, "This is what we're doing now?" That's all the monks did to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feels like fighting against the tide, if you know what I mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like the gods all chose you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't chosen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you believe in destiny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, the question is: Where do you think you're going? Where would you like to go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get to choose that on a day-to-day basis, and that's what makes me happy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot of free will involved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like that. Let's go to bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before they come in the room-- I'm alone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you choose to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, in our room. I was only rooming with Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sending on The Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You miss me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then a somewhat tired voice responds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More money to be made."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as much as he gets out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I send a message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To my mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you miss me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We fought some dead giants. I talked to dad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I talked--" (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Giants! That's impressive! I'm proud of you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They think we're heroes, but don't worry I still--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I'm proud of you, my little sapphire."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold my necklace as I fall asleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to if I can, well, do I have--yeah. I'm going to cast one last spell before I go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to cast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Commune.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Gold Chain Mercenaries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the Overcrow within the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is nearby, yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this threaten the people of this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She seems unclear of the question being asked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the King That Crawls threaten the people of this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is of no threat to the people of this city."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why did they stop expanding the city? Why build the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But they expand into lands treacherous, "some mind is paid."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will continue to walk your path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rest well, my Clay," and the sun sets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking awesome!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had one minor bit of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So smart!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then goes to his room and takes out the silver thread and methodically starts surrounding the room while Frumpkin bothers Fjord and he gets ready for bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else just going to find an evening's rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One for each partner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have a post--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't always have to have a love--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not getting our deposit back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we get some narration?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Didn't we establish these were placebo?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Placebo works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So wait, do you wake Yeza up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he seems like he's asleep, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pretty stealthy. Are you trying to be stealthy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I just plop down on the bed hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you slip him the digit? (Matt shushes)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a whole new level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't awaken, but he seems to just rustle around a minute and then pull the blanket close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just spoon him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Matt laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you going to do something weird?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody's got to keep the standards--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before you drift off to sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Anchorage weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really like it, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, it's going to be weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord's getting a dream while Nott's thinking about boning Yeza.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I in the wrong bed? This isn't Yeza.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In my dream, I just heard (thudding).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hotel rules.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you hear the clatter of metal. (clanging)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach around in the dark for the sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your falchion is on the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, nope, sorry, I just uh-- (coughing) - was--yes, sorry. Go back to sleep. Everything's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea what time it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I hear Caleb breathing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just wanted to make you roll for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he sound like he's asleep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not go back to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, and I rolled a 27 deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beat a 27, my man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He's asleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and bamf it away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have any idea what time it is, how long I've been asleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just sitting alone in your soaked bedsheets clutching your sword, confused in the darkness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will get up and gather shoes and basic armaments and I will try to quietly exit the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You grab your things and shuffle and stumble into a chair, grab your bag and, as you step, does he set off your Alarm spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he was considered an ally, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin and I watch him go, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (door creaking) You think it's closed and you push it and goes (thump) like, "Shit!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck! (clears throat) Is there more light in the hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is. There are three low-burning oil lanterns that are fixed to the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I walk over underneath one of the lanterns and look at the falchion? Does it look the same, different? Is the eye still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks the same the eye's still there, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anyone in the hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, no, not at this hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I conjure up a ball of eldritch energy in my hand and see what the eye does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dripping off your nose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find a corner, like an alley or just a closed space where no one is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find one little subsection there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Puddles. Are there puddles? Are there puddles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are puddles, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find a puddle and look in the ground and I will use Mask of Many Faces to make myself look like Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just a guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will take the sword back inside and walk back up to my room, and try and quietly go back to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you all begin to rouse from your slumber, and we'll return there after our break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Matthew Mercer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was dope as fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Travis! You have no powers, oh no!

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: ♪ Regular Fjord, regular Fjord ♪

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, don't listen!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got muggled! (Travis screams)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Squib!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Squib!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ♪ You got the perfect warlock ♪ ♪ Her weapons and supplies ♪ ♪ But you need a place to track your stuff ♪ ♪ 'cause you're so disorganized ♪ ♪ You click open the webpage ♪ ♪ You heard about on Critical Role ♪ ♪ And now you're ready to kick some butt ♪ ♪ In that mineshaft full of gnolls ♪ ♪ It's D&D ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪ ♪ Yeah D&D ♪ ♪ Yeah ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪ ♪ You got your stats, you've got your swords ♪ ♪ And you got your invisible wand ♪ ♪ It's D&D D&D ♪ ♪ D&D ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪ [high-pitched note] [thudding footsteps]

lines.name: BINWIN
lines.text: Hi I'm Binwin Bronzebottom, celebrity dwarf and video game enthusiast and this is my sidekick, Crowy.

lines.text: Hello!

lines.text: They're Canadian so you know it's good.

lines.name: BINWIN
lines.text: Of course not.

lines.text: He died.

lines.name: BINWIN
lines.text: How do you like it, Perkins?

lines.name: CROWY
lines.text: Create the best adventuring party possible based on the formation options, your character's ability, and the obstacles and enemies you face.

lines.name: BINWIN
lines.text: Or you just randomly click on things like I do and hope for the best.

lines.name: CROWY
lines.text: You click on enemies to assist your champions, or you can set them up and walk away and let them do their thing, it's entirely up to you.

lines.name: BINWIN
lines.text: I'm playing on the toilet right now!

lines.name: CROWY
lines.text: So download it now!

lines.name: BINWIN
lines.text: End with joke!

lines.name: CROWY
lines.text: You're not supposed to read it.

lines.text: It says end with joke.

lines.name: CROWY
lines.text: No, we're supposed to come up with a joke to go with where it says end with joke.

lines.text: I don't know, "end with joke" is pretty funny.

lines.name: CROWY
lines.text: Wait on three, ready?

lines.name: BINWIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: CROWY
lines.text: One, two, three.

lines.name: BINWIN, CROWY
lines.text: End with joke! BRIAN (VO): Last time on Talks Machina.

lines.name: BRIAN

lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: "While Pike and Grog were bestest buddies, "Fjord and Yasha haven't had much change to build "a rapport yet. Are you looking forward to forging "a connection, and where do you think their common "ground lies?" Well, both of you have played Yasha, that's where.

lines.text: So I think he's looking just to connect and say like, "Hey, I know we don't know "much, but I'll tell you some of my terrible "stuff if you tell me yours."

lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: [birds chirping]

lines.text: [various jungle animal noises] [static] TRAVIS (VO): Last time on Yee-Haw Game Ranch.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: (Travis laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: No, look, I'll shoot it, you can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TRAVIS

Either there's an argument for being checked out to be okay and there's an argument for knowing too much to leave.

lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: Maybe some other time.

lines.text: I did get this really cool hair oil, though, I can't wait to start using it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking forward to trying it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the meantime, while you guys are having this conversation, you've rushed outside into the rain and a few moments later, you hear the pacing of Yasha following behind as you begin to beeline.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Mostly trailing him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have I noticed that he's unarmed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's usually unarmed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You are usually unarmed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He summons his sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sword lives in a pocket space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Matt laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you just keeping a distance to watch? Or do you approach?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to approach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You hear Yasha come up from behind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I'll give you some time if you need to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To Wursh's?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, just I want to ask him about making something for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You mentioned bracers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Let's go there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys exit and you can see back where you came, Fjord and Yasha are quite a ways up, but they're heading in the direction of the Hammered Call.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we're walking, do we see any kind of temples in particular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are definitely placed in a religious way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (water quenching)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After you and I'll hold out my hand and I'll try and cast Minor Illusion just to make a little bird in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bird.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Wait!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that was nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am glad we are here. After you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, what I can do to help you?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I'm wondering if I could have you make something for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm looking for bracers of some sort for--I'm looking to up my armor a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bracers won't do much to protect you alone."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh hey."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Wursh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fjord was it, right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to see you again."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You too. I wanted to thank you for your words the last time we met. I, um--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sets the metal aside, letting it cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I confess, I have a bit of temper when it comes to people talking about our kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's okay. Our kind has a temper."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mind if I ask you a personal question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as Jester and Caduceus step into the doorway he goes, "Depending."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if it's a bad timing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to step outside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is going on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We just--I remembered I want to show you guys something outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of them leave and it's just the two of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said you grew up with more of our race, is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I'm Boroftkrah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were they accepting of you, welcoming our kind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were proud people and good people, "but we weren't the only orc clan "in the Wildlands and others tended "to lean into their violent side."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I only heard stories about that wild side. It was what most people expected my reaction to be, one of anger and rage and violence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all perspective. It's all about the other."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When they look at you in that way-- granted, you are a fucking ten-ton truck-- what do you do? Shake it off? Give them a look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me? Best not give in to a man I can crush with one hand."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ones that draw blades you can see, "the ones that mean to cut and you just "keep on moving."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you happy here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't know if I take too kindly "to this intensely religious atmosphere."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, around their thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They don't push it on you, but it's annoying."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They talk about it all the time, or just fervent worship, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, just checking to see if you're "interested in coming to one of their little gatherings."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of gatherings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Firmaments by the various "high glass temples and such."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They hold regular meetings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not regular. You know the shade above us?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They let that slip every now and then."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those are the holy days."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happens when the sun is let in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All bleedy eyed and enduring it, "but it's part of how they do their prayer, I guess."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bet that's good for a laugh, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's fine. It's not for me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they do that every few days, once a week, do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Storm right now, probably won't happen "any time soon."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. I appreciate you extending a kind word. You didn't have to do that, and it's been a while, so thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry for calling you runt."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She is a gentle giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Send her back in and I'll see what I can do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think he's got some think he's got some good stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks for giving me a second.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all come in with Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come in as well or do you stay outside?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I stay outside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stay outside for a second as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They might suit your toughened wrists."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm trying to think if that's enough. I'm trying to think of what I can wear?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what could work? I've heard of like rings that help protect you. It's like a shield almost, an enchanted ring.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I've seen them before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gold piece for the bracers?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if those are what I need, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you could always take the bracers and maybe we can find somebody?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, how much do you charge for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the bracers, a gold piece."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A gold piece?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just told you, yeah."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I will buy some of those and maybe see if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All due respect."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I work out a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come back--give me a couple hours."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is just a piece of practice material "I can fashion you something nice."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries. You want anything?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you saying to our friend? Were you being nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were having a frank conversation, "passing by. Why?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He sometimes, I don't know, he hasn't really been around a lot of people that are like him, so I hope you're being nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm being me; I don't "know if that's nice or not. That's all I know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's got a good heart."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Careful. Good hearts don't do well "in times of conflict." He takes the metal prongs and starts heating it in the forge once more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, we'll come back then.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few hours and it'll be done, I promise."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, thank you, Wursh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see his abs, though?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's massive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would you guys mind? I need to go to a dress shop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He needs to buy a dress?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, just clothes, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's cool if he does, I just didn't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there a clothing shop nearby? That I can run in very quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These aren't fine upper class garments, but these are general clothing, pieces of attire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does he want?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I show her the parchment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want me to read it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dark muted purple coat that's fur-lined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: New boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: New boots, he could use some.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dark charcoal gray in the Kryn style breeches and shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And these are his exact measurements.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's also 5'3"; it's crazy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only if she's 5'3"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For the sake of brevity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay, so for those custom outfits, it'll take a few days.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the full ensemble there it'll run you about ten gold pieces.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They'll be made with fine materials.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess, yeah, that means that we were going to buy some stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you did?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but they were being custom made, too, so they're probably only getting ready about now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, been a few enough days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet, so we'll pick up our stuff then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys go and regather?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm giving him the eye the entire time, but yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Moi

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys make your way back to gather at the Dim's Inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! I'm wearing my new coat, and my new dress. I'm spinning in circles so everyone can see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I apologize for the intrusion, "do you have a moment for your time, please?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course, Slow-Mo. What was on your mind? (Matt laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's even a pen for your beasts."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is very generous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it like an Airbnb or something? Like, do we have to pay for it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, it is being provided."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are giving us a house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you've given us hope "and helped lessen the terrible impact "of what the Empire has wrought "on us, so it's the very least we could do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And very generous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you like to see it?"

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just go upstairs and we'll gather our things, okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll just grab our stuff real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. I will wait for you outside."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He drifts out of the inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How does he do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe he's wearing wheels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got Wheelies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got a Segway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run up the stairs to the room real fast and as soon as I get in there, can I try and summon the sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gust of wind) It appears in your grip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make it go away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's fucking with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's fucking with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know he can fuck with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ready to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeza's like, "We have a house here now?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we're not going to stay for very long, but for right now, I don't know how to get us away from here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's just the--wow, it's a lot."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Crazy things happen with these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've made some unique friends."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sure have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah? Who's your favorite?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I don't know, they're all pretty nice."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're really not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like the tall guy," and points over to Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's mysterious. Yeah and wise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "His energy's more palatable."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (choking and coughing) (laughter) I'm okay. (coughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He'd fit in right in Felderwin, he would."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except for the tall thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you know that's fine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway, let's go check it out and you know what? A safe place to just sort of wait. Also, maybe tonight before bed, we can ask Jester to check in on the boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll grab what--I don't have anything, "what am I saying. I'm good to go." The rest of you guys gather your things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give Beau her new clothes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look good? Does it look like I killed a pirate?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's very dashing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still smells like her a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are exiting the inn, Gaben in the back goes, "So you're leaving us, "if I am to hear correctly?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's been fun."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it's been great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Goodbye."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, for being so gracious with our animals and I place five gold on the counter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I appreciate your patronage "and paying me... for once."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, are we behind? I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it was being paid for by "the Den Kryn, "so it's fine. It was a favor."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's make it ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I won't argue."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Appreciate, it thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Humans."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like a tattoo as payment for my room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I'm fine, thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure the Bright Queen would appreciate it if you would take my favor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would think not, but I appreciate "your being so generous."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Matt laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stays dry amongst the storm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so goth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the water that's moving around moving slowly or is it just kind of moving around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just drifting off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put the collar that I bought around Yarnball. I had the dressmaker make a collar that matches my cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, also bring the staff over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus--and as we walk, I hand it to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the sword thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have that in the bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold it up to the sword!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get to where our new digs are and I slide the ring on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got some stuff and among the stuff, that was a sword thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn, I want that staff. It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the ring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you taking the ring?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course he's taking the ring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Certainly I'm taking the ring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about Yasha?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it 1d6 halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as the--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Recharge-regain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's in the front of battle all the time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She also has a much lower AC than you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know what--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She doesn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's incorrect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb is very, very important.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, that's mean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are misinformed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can mount my crystal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your AC, Ash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He needs it, don't you take it away from my Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a special boy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leave me alone. I am a wee bab on the battlefield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to figure you out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I have your flashlight thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have the goggles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you give me the goggles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, fuck you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, fuck you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go find our new fucking house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lead on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This way," and he glides off to lead you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking low trying to get a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it like a centipede, like there's 100 little legs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception, perception, perception. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Following below, it's hard to see because the cloak almost meets the ground, but looking below: his feet aren't touching the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just drifting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the light, that guy floats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "By the light."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ♪ By the li-li-li-li-li ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There will be more to be done soon enough," and he hands the keys over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ask a question? We ran into someone who mentioned that they have gatherings over in these areas of worship in the Firmament, regular displays of letting the sun in a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, that is correct."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is such a display scheduled to happen anytime soon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Usually when the weather is right "and it's been time and when they decide, "then yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they send out like a communique or a call or a horn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'll know because the--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sun will come out, which is rare in this town."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now that I'm saying it out loud, I feel kind of stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, enjoy your abode."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you need anything else."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Power move. That's a power move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's such a power move! Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get that hug!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes! 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes like-- And then ever so slowly drifts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hug him like real good and I hold it for an awkward amount of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give him the Molly Shannon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway. I'll take my leave." (zooms) (laughter) Well, there is your home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are blueprints!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a house!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, this is so cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Start thinking about what you want to do in Rosohna with that time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we doing like a jump cut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way, at least you'll have a week to start planning that out, figuring out what you want to do and what your next direction may be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm taking a picture so that we can send this out and we can claim our bedrooms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We haven't done this since Greyskull.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! Where's the tower?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's top of the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. There's the top of the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know who hasn't seen it all? The people on this side of the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's weird it got sent over here, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't that weird how it feels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as colored, but here you have it.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (fake sneezes)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ew!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to call it Winterfell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The White House.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, The White House.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take the keys and open the front door and enter the dark but comparably warm and dry interior of your new gifted home courtesy of Den Thelyss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to carry Yeza across the threshold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you step in, we're going to go ahead and end our session there tonight. We'll pick up there next week on Thursday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't believe about the sword situation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, the fucking sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're doing an elapsed time, like I want to do this this and this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys have a week to start figuring out what you want to do for the time period and what your next path is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, hey, hey. Focus up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're choosing our bedrooms!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to decorate here, what the hell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there room for a training pit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll talk about it in a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just like a condo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a gilded cage, a gilded cage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, go on, Matt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]
